name: Earworm
description:
Earworm is a short first person adventure where you hunt for sound objects in order to progress through the level and the soundtrack.

Along the way strange ear entities will guide your direction to assemble the soundscape and lead you to the final offering.

Music was created for this project by Nicolas Snyder

Headphones Recommended

CONTROLS

LMB (hold) - Pick Up

RMB - Throw WASD - Movement

SPACE - Jump

CTRL - Crouch

1 - Main Level

2 - Sandbox

ESC - Quit
